description.sun-moon:
The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores
more HP in a sandstorm.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores
more HP in a sandstorm.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores
more HP in a sandstorm.
description.sword-shield:
The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores
more HP in a sandstorm.

effect.full: Heals the user for ½ its max HP.  During a sandstorm, the healing is increased to ⅔.
effect.shortEffect: Heals the user for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ during a sandstorm.
